query:
SELECT 
  (SELECT COUNT(*) FROM planes_sucesion) as planes_sucesion_total,
  (SELECT COUNT(*) FROM planes_sustitucion) as planes_sustitucion_total,
  (SELECT COUNT(*) FROM planes_sustitucion WHERE puestoClave = 'Si') as planes_sustitucion_criticos;
command:
mysql --batch --raw --column-names --default-character-set=utf8mb4 --host gateway03.us-east-1.prod.aws.tidbcloud.com --port 4000 --user j2FTkFQTdFUnQgU.root --database TfZrNnU8ACksUNuSJSy8Lr --execute SELECT 
  (SELECT COUNT(*) FROM planes_sucesion) as planes_sucesion_total,
  (SELECT COUNT(*) FROM planes_sustitucion) as planes_sustitucion_total,
  (SELECT COUNT(*) FROM planes_sustitucion WHERE puestoClave = 'Si') as planes_sustitucion_criticos;
